name: Schatzsucher
overview: A platformer written by Maik and Mario Qualmann and published in both 64'er 1990/09 and 64'er Sonderheft 79. Mario Qualmann from Grevesmühlen in the GDR designed the graphics for this game, working with his brother Maik, Schatzsucher or in English, Treasure Hunter is an exciting game of skill in which you have to steer your character, which is based on Indiana Jones, through a house and collect sacks of gold. Unfortunately, you don't have unlimited time to do this. You're also being hunted by a ghost. Always avoiding this is not that easy and sometimes not even possible. Then, with the gnashing of teeth five different levels and four game speeds must be dealt with. All this in a 20-line program!
